description: Custom ChatGPT AI chatbot trained on your website and files. Integrated with 6000+ apps. No coding, on your website in minutes.
title: Chatwith - Custom ChatGPT chatbot with your website & files
introduction: Chatwith is an AI-powered tool that offers a free AI FAQ Generator and custom GPT training for chatbots. It provides solutions for automating FAQ creation, training custom GPT on data, and creating user-friendly and SEO-friendly FAQs.
pricing: Usage-based pricing with monthly and annual billing options, offering a 14-day free trial and 2 months free for annual subscriptions.

faqs.question: How does an AI FAQ generator work?
faqs.answer: The AI FAQ generator uses advanced AI technology to analyze common queries and automatically generate a comprehensive list of frequently asked questions for your FAQ page.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of using the free AI FAQ tool?
faqs.answer: Using the free AI FAQ tool helps in creating user-friendly and informative FAQs, enhancing customer satisfaction, automating the FAQ creation process, improving SEO efforts, and quickly generating relevant FAQs tailored to the target audience.
